restrict your baby’s feeding. If 
you	notice	significant	feeding	
difficulties	2	to	3	weeks	after	
the procedure, contact your 
midwife or health visitor.
Staying healthy
You don’t need to eat 
anything special while you are 
breastfeeding, just make sure 
you have a varied and balanced 
diet.
Your milk is good for your baby 
whatever you eat, but there 
are a few foods to avoid (see 
next page). Being a new mother 
is hard work though, so it’s
